text: Fearless Leader is the main antagonist in the 1959-1964 The Rocky and Bullwinkle Show. In the show, he employs fellow main villains Boris Badenov and Natasha Fatale. He was originally voiced by Bill Scott and currently by Piotr Michael. ==References== Category:Fictional characters introduced in the 1950s Category:The Rocky and Bullwinkle Show characters
title: Fearless Leader
